### Ward Boundaries

[![Ward Boundary Map](https://www.cityofcolemantx.us/elections/images/wards-map.jpg)](https://www.cityofcolemantx.us/elections/pdf/wards-map.pdf)

2026 Election Information
=========================

---

### General Election Date: May 2, 2026 Día de elecciónes 2 de Mayo de 2026

  

### Polling Location

All voting will be conducted at the City Council Chambers located at 200 W. Liveoak, Coleman, Texas

  

### Candidate Applications

The May 2, 2026, General Election will be held at the Coleman City Hall / City Council Chambers,
located at 200 W. Liveoak. Filing for a place on the ballot is set by state statute and will run from
January 14 to February 13, 2026. Filing packets may be picked up at City Hall. Contact the City Secretary at (325) 625-4116, for more information.

### Offices to be elected:

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Place 1 - North Ward | Current Office Holder - Tracy Rankin |
| Place 4 - South Ward | Current Office Holder - Monte Sides |

### Important Dates

* January 1, 2026 - First day to apply for a ballot by mail.
* January 14, 2026 - First day to have your name placed on the
  ballot.
* February 13, 2026 - Last day to have your name placed on the
  ballot.
* February 17, 2026 - Last day to file a Declaration of Write-in Candidacy.
* April 2, 2026 - Last day to register to vote.
* April 20, 2026 - Last day to apply for a ballot by mail.

---

### Candidates

The following candidates have filed to run in the 2025 General Election (Candidates will be listed here as they file for office.):

#### Candidates for Council Place 1 - North Ward

[COLEMAN, TX WEATHER](https://forecast7.com/en/31d83n99d43/coleman/?unit=us)

City of Coleman  
P.O. Box 592 / 200 W. Liveoak St.  
Coleman, Texas 76834  
(325) 625-4116

Hours of Operation:   
Monday - Friday: 8am - 5pm  
Utility Billing open through lunch  
Most other offices closed for lunch

The City of Coleman is an Equal Opportunity Employer;
  
Supporter of Equal Housing Opportunity; Citizen Participation;   
The Fair Housing Policy; and, The Americans with Disabilities Act.
